ModMetaData.name: MortarManiac
ModMetaData.author: Prism
ModMetaData.description:
Adds multiple mortar shells for use ingame 

 Cluster Shell: splits up into multiple smaller explosions on impact 
 Hive Shell: triggers an infestation on impact 
 Meteorite Shell: causes a meteorite to fall down on impact 
 Storm Shell: multiple lightning strikes strike the target location on impact 
 Tornado Shell: causes a tornado to appear on impact 
 
 Some of those Shells can be crafted, some only be bought or obtained as a quest reward.
